ability.name: Patter Song
ability.flavor: Dazzle them with your fancy patter and they forget where they were.

metadata.flavor: Dazzle them with your fancy patter and they forget where they were.

effect.t1: One ally within distance can take their turn immediately after yours.
effect.t2: Two allies within distance can take their turns immediately after yours in any order.
effect.t3: Three allies within distance can take their turns immediately after yours in any order. One of those allies can have already taken a turn this combat round.
